mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zsi_test_case (test_name, method, url, headers, parameters, created_at, updated_at, suite, test_module, descs, pre_action_names, post_action_names, check_points) VALUES (#{testName}, #{method}, #{url}, #{headers}, #{parameters}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{suite}, #{testModule }, #{descs}, #{preActionNames,javaType=List,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=org.tangxi.testplatform.handler.ListTypeHandler}, #{postActionNames,javaType=List,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=org.tangxi.testplatform.handler.ListTypeHandler}, #{checkPoints,javaType=List,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=org.tangxi.testplatform.handler.ListTypeHandler} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zsi_test_case SET test_name = #{testName}, method = #{method}, url = #{url}, headers = #{headers}, parameters = #{parameters}, created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, suite = #{suite}, test_module = #{testModule}, descs = #{descs}, pre_action_names = #{preActionNames,javaType=List,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=org.tangxi.testplatform.handler.ListTypeHandler}, post_action_names = #{postActionNames,javaType=List,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=org.tangxi.testplatform.handler.ListTypeHandler}, check_points = #{checkPoints,javaType=List,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=org.tangxi.testplatform.handler.ListTypeHandler} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM zsi_test_case WHERE 1=1
AND test_name LIKE concat('%',#{testName},'%')
AND descs LIKE concat('%',#{descs},'%')
AND is_deleted = 1
AND is_disabled = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM zsi_test_case WHERE parameters LIKE concat('%',#{parameter},'%') AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM zsi_test_case WHERE (zsi_test_case.pre_action_names LIKE concat('%',#{action},'%') or post_action_names LIKE concat('%',#{action},'%')) AND is_deleted = 0
